item.title: Malloc Lies
item.description: In software development, when we want to store data in main memory, we need to reserve memory space. This is called memory allocation.

item.title: Switched to HUGO
item.description: This site now uses HUGO with the Ezhil theme. The HUGO way of building a static website fits my way of working much more than the standard GitHub way using Jekyll.

item.title: The whole truth
item.description: To tell the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth is a well-known phrase used in court and TV series to affirm that a person’s statements are true and complete.

item.title: The half-life of an age related protein
item.description: As a Sunday morning project, I have tried to resolve a question that has been bothering me for some time.
